title: Poisoned Quills
description: Armed with the Archive documents, you must warn Councilor Vane that the Silken Hand is targeting the aqueducts. But the Council Chambers themselves may be compromised.

turns.narrative: You reach the Council Chambers. Vane's guards look different today—tense, unfamiliar. When you ask to see him, they cross their halberds to block your path.
turns.choice_a: Intimidate the guards into stepping aside
turns.consequence_a: They falter, letting you pass, but silently lock the heavy oak doors behind you.
turns.choice_b: Use a side-entrance known for servant access
turns.consequence_b: You bypass the guards entirely and slip into Vane's private study.

turns.narrative: Vane is at his desk, but a masked figure stands behind him, holding a poisoned needle to his neck. 'Drop the documents,' the assassin whispers.
turns.consequence_a: The assassin snatches them and throws a smoke bomb, escaping, but Vane lives unharmed.
turns.choice_b: Throw a dagger at the assassin
turns.consequence_b: You clip the assassin's shoulder. They drop the needle, scratching Vane, and flee out the window. Vane is poisoned.

turns.narrative: If Vane is poisoned, you have moments to act before the toxin reaches his heart.
turns.choice_a: Administer a generic antivenom from your pack
turns.consequence_a: It stabilizes him, but he falls into a deep coma. The documents are safe.
turns.choice_b: Let him die, saving the documents (If you didn't drop them)
turns.consequence_b: Vane perishes. You keep the intel, but Emberheart loses a key leader.

vane_saved_docs_lost.description: Councilor Vane lives, but the Silken Hand retrieved the aqueduct plans.

vane_comatose_docs_safe.description: Vane is in a coma, but you retained the vital intelligence.

vane_dead.description: Councilor Vane is dead. The High Ward is in mourning and panic.

conclusion: Councilor Vane lives, but the Silken Hand retrieved the aqueduct plans.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
